s.text: My husband says that one of the side-effects of this lower crime rate is that police are arresting fewer people because so many criminals are already locked up.
My husband says that one of the side-effects of this lower crime rate is that police are arresting fewer people because so many criminals are already locked up.
I think Rudy's a great mayor, by the way, and a city probably needs a Fascist to run it, etc.
